amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the funding level for the Department of Housing and Urban Development by two percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 54 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to reduce the funding level for the Department of Housing and Urban Development by two percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 280 (Roll no. 454).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 280 (Roll no. 454).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Grothman.
